descripcion: I am a bachelor student of software engineering, I have advanced knowledge and practice in languages such as Java, SQL, C#, C++, HTML, JS, CSS. I have a C1 degree in English language and a B2 certificate from Cambridge University, I also have a certificate of SCRUM Fundamentals, I also have experience with the fundamentals of programming such as the use of design patterns and Object Oriented Programming.

habilidades_tecnicas: Computer skills such as hardware and software management.
